title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil pasta until al dente.
Fry bacon until crispy.
Whisk eggs and cheese together.
Combine pasta with bacon and egg mixture.
Season with pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with spices and yogurt.
Grill chicken until golden.
Cook onions and tomato puree in a pan.
Add cream and grilled chicken.
Simmer for 15 minutes and serve with rice.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Simple and healthy breakfast option with mashed avocado on toasted bread.
instructions: Toast the bread slices.
Mash avocado with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
Spread avocado mixture on toast.
Sprinkle chili flakes on top and serve.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Colorful vegetables stir-fried in soy sauce and garlic.
instructions: Chop all vegetables.
Heat oil in a wok and saut√© garlic.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Pour soy sauce and mix well.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy pancakes served with syrup and fresh fruits.
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder in a bowl.
Add eggs and milk, whisk until smooth.
Heat a pan and pour batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip.
Serve with syrup and fruits.
